verbs.description: Political infighting that [V: has] been a hallmark of the Trump White House is spreading to the rest of the administration - and to K Street as well .
[ARG1: Political infighting] [R-ARG1: that] has [V: been] [ARG2: a hallmark of the Trump White House] is spreading to the rest of the administration - and to K Street as well .
